titleStmt.title: Vnparallel'd reasons for abollishing episcopacy. 1. It will assure his Majesties authority royall. 2. Increase his revenue. 3. Settle a good union in his Majesties owne kingdomes, and between them and other reformed churches. 4. Cause a good understanding betweene his Majesty and his people. By N. F. Esquire.
titleStmt.author: Fiennes, Nathaniel, 1607 or 8-1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: for S.S. dwelling in Budge-row, at the signe of the blacke Bull,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Nathaniel Fiennes. Cf. BLC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Budge-row, at the signe of the blacke Bull
